question: 絶叫
sourceMnemonic: <kanji>Extinction</kanji> caused by a <kanji>shout</kanji>. You are making everyone else's voices go extinct, and you <vocabulary>scream</vocabulary> and <vocabulary>shout</vocabulary> over them. You are making an <vocabulary>exclamation</vocabulary>, gosh darn it.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own. Careful of the shortening.
